abstract: Biotechnology company Amylin Pharmaceuticals on Friday said it was notified of two plans to nominate directors to the company’s board: one by entities associated with investor Carl Icahn and another from shareholder Black Bear Fund.
snippet: Biotechnology company Amylin Pharmaceuticals on Friday said it was notified of two plans to nominate directors to the company’s board: one by entities associated with investor Carl Icahn and another from shareholder Black Bear Fund.
lead_paragraph: Biotechnology company Amylin Pharmaceuticals on Friday said it was notified of two plans to nominate directors to the company’s board: one by entities associated with investor Carl Icahn and another from shareholder Black Bear Fund, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Icahn Seeks Proxy Fight at Amylin
